title: Client crashes, I lose my series and I get a 30 minute penalty...
body: I understand that there is an issue with knowing if you really did crash or if you simply dodged a game and now are trying to get what you lost from it back... I'm not asking for a refund of my LP or my series or a removal of the penalty, all I want is for this to be fixed, this is the second time it has happened to me during promotion series games and it's pretty annoying.

replies.body:
If you're crashing during champ select, it's most likely caused by a poor connection to the servers. I recommend checking out our [Connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step in resolving this as it goes over the most common solutions for connection issues.

Let me know if it caused any change.
